item.description:
@Trade_Me wrote:

I’m Hard coding a interface, And I was wondering how I could get the hover to work for this…
The interface works and everything, it’s fine… It’s just the hover…

	public static void LoginInterface(RSFont[] tda) { //Login Interface on start-up
